subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Twenty American men entered the United States Open and seven were playing on Friday — from No. 9 John Isner, the top ranked American, to Dennis Novikov, the No. 1,098 player in the world.
snippet: Twenty American men entered the United States Open and seven were playing on Friday — from No. 9 John Isner, the top ranked American, to Dennis Novikov, the No. 1,098 player in the world.
